description: A dashboard that monitors Karpenter and focuses on giving a overview for Karpenter. It is created using the [kubernetes-autoscaling-mixin](https://github.com/adinhodovic/kubernetes-autoscaling-mixin).

targets.expr:
sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_pod_requests{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="cpu",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
) +
sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_daemon_requests{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="cpu",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
)

sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_pod_requests{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="memory",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
) +
sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_daemon_requests{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="memory",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
)

count(
  count(
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      region=~"$region",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  ) by (node_name)
)

count by (nodepool) (
  count by (node_name, nodepool) (
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      region=~"$region",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  )
)

count by (instance_type) (
  count by (node_name, instance_type) (
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      region=~"$region",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  )
)

count by (capacity_type) (
  count by (node_name, capacity_type) (
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      region=~"$region",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  )
)

count by (region) (
  count by (node_name, region) (
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      region=~"$region",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  )
)

count by (zone) (
  count by (node_name, zone) (
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  )
)

count by (arch) (
  count by (node_name, arch) (
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  )
)

count by (os) (
  count by (node_name, os) (
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      region=~"$region",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  )
)

sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_pod_requests{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="cpu",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
) +
sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_daemon_requests{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="cpu",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
)

sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_pod_requests{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="memory",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
) +
sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_daemon_requests{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="memory",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
)

sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_pod_limits{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="cpu",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
) +
sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_daemon_limits{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="cpu",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
)

sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_pod_limits{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="memory",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
) +
sum(
  karpenter_nodes_total_daemon_limits{
    cluster="$cluster",
    job=~"$job",
    resource_type="memory",
    region=~"$region",
    zone=~"$zone",
    arch=~"$arch",
    os=~"$os",
    instance_type=~"$instance_type",
    capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
    nodepool=~"$nodepool"
  }
)

(
  (
    sum(
      karpenter_nodes_total_pod_requests{
        cluster="$cluster",
        job=~"$job",
        resource_type="cpu",
        region=~"$region",
        zone=~"$zone",
        arch=~"$arch",
        os=~"$os",
        instance_type=~"$instance_type",
        capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
        nodepool=~"$nodepool"
      }
    ) by (node_name, nodepool, instance_type, instance_memory, instance_cpu, instance_network_bandwidth, region, zone, os, capacity_type, arch)
    +
    sum(
      karpenter_nodes_total_daemon_requests{
        cluster="$cluster",
        job=~"$job",
        resource_type="cpu",
        region=~"$region",
        zone=~"$zone",
        arch=~"$arch",
        os=~"$os",
        instance_type=~"$instance_type",
        capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
        nodepool=~"$nodepool"
      }
    ) by (node_name, nodepool, instance_type, instance_memory, instance_cpu, instance_network_bandwidth, region, zone, os, capacity_type, arch)
  ) /
  sum(
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      resource_type="cpu",
      region=~"$region",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  ) by (node_name, nodepool, instance_type, instance_memory, instance_cpu, instance_network_bandwidth, region, zone, os, capacity_type, arch)
) * 100

(
  (
    sum(
      karpenter_nodes_total_pod_requests{
        cluster="$cluster",
        job=~"$job",
        resource_type="memory",
        region=~"$region",
        zone=~"$zone",
        arch=~"$arch",
        os=~"$os",
        instance_type=~"$instance_type",
        capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
        nodepool=~"$nodepool"
      }
    ) by (node_name, nodepool, instance_type, instance_memory, instance_memory, instance_network_bandwidth, region, zone, os, capacity_type, arch)
    +
    sum(
      karpenter_nodes_total_daemon_requests{
        cluster="$cluster",
        job=~"$job",
        resource_type="memory",
        region=~"$region",
        zone=~"$zone",
        arch=~"$arch",
        os=~"$os",
        instance_type=~"$instance_type",
        capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
        nodepool=~"$nodepool"
      }
    ) by (node_name, nodepool, instance_type, instance_memory, instance_memory, instance_network_bandwidth, region, zone, os, capacity_type, arch)
  ) /
  sum(
    karpenter_nodes_allocatable{
      cluster="$cluster",
      job=~"$job",
      resource_type="memory",
      region=~"$region",
      zone=~"$zone",
      arch=~"$arch",
      os=~"$os",
      instance_type=~"$instance_type",
      capacity_type=~"$capacity_type",
      nodepool=~"$nodepool"
    }
  ) by (node_name, nodepool, instance_type, instance_memory, instance_memory, instance_network_bandwidth, region, zone, os, capacity_type, arch)
) * 100

list.label: Instance Type
list.name: instance_type
list.query: label_values(karpenter_nodes_allocatable{cluster="$cluster", job=~"$job", region=~"$region", zone=~"$zone", arch=~"$arch", os=~"$os"}, instance_type)

list.label: Capacity Type
list.name: capacity_type
list.query: label_values(karpenter_nodes_allocatable{cluster="$cluster", job=~"$job", region=~"$region", zone=~"$zone", arch=~"$arch", os=~"$os", instance_type=~"$instance_type"}, capacity_type)

list.label: Node Pool
list.name: nodepool
list.query: label_values(karpenter_nodes_allocatable{cluster="$cluster", job=~"$job", region=~"$region", zone=~"$zone", arch=~"$arch", os=~"$os", instance_type=~"$instance_type", capacity_type=~"$capacity_type"}, nodepool)

title: Kubernetes / Autoscaling / Karpenter / Overview
